summary: Simple hair retex for less scraggly long hair.
descriptionHtml:
Simple hair retex for less scraggly long hair.

Replaces the texture for the long hair styles, both male and female.

1.1: Hopefully most bugs ironed out and hair portion of the texture redrawn from scratch @ 2048x2048.

Installation: Extract the Data folder to your /skyrim/ directory.

Uninstallation: Delete the \'hair\' folder from data/textures/actor/character.
author: WhoAteTheRamen
